highlights.headline: Rockies top Marlins for first three-game sweep in over a year
highlights.description: The Rockies hold off the Marlins for a 3-2 victory and their first three-game sweep since May 2024.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights) 2025/06/04 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Isaac Collins' 3-run HR pads Brewers' 9-1 lead
highlights.description: Isaac Collins drives in 3-run home run to seal the game for the Brewers against the Reds.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Milwaukee Brewers vs. Cincinnati Reds: Game Highlights) 2025/06/04 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Isaac Collins belted a three-run homer, and Jackson Chourio and Daz Cameron each hit two-run shots as the Milwaukee Brewers won their 12th consecutive series against the Cincinnati Reds with a 9-1 victory on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Collins hits 3-run homer, Chourio and Cameron belt 2-run shots as Brewers beat Reds 9-1

highlights.headline: Is this the shortest walk-off HR ever? Ceddanne Rafaela wins it for the Red Sox
highlights.description: Ceddanne Rafaela blasts a 308-foot home run for the Red Sox in an 11-9 walk-off win over the Angels.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Is this the shortest walk-off HR ever? Ceddanne Rafaela wins it for the Red Sox) 2025/06/04 ESHEET

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Los Angeles Angels vs. Boston Red Sox: Game Highlights) 2025/06/04 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Ceddanne Rafaela curled a home run around the Pesky Pole in the bottom of the ninth inning on Wednesday and the Boston Red Sox rallied after trailing four different times to beat the Los Angeles Angels 11-9.
headlines.shortLinkText: Red Sox rally, then rally again for 11-9 win over Angels on Rafaela's walk-off homer

events.name: Los Angeles Angels at Boston Red Sox

headlines.description: — Pittsburgh's Mike Burrows held Houston in check into the sixth inning to pick up the first victory of his career as a starter as the Pirates topped the Astros 3-0 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pirates rookie Mike Burrows shuts down Astros to pick up first win as a starter in 3-0 victory

highlights.headline: Boyd, Gore keep batters baffled in pitchers' duel
highlights.description: Cubs' Matthew Boyd and Nationals' MacKenzie Gore put on a show as they combine for 13 strikeouts for their respective clubs.

headlines.description: — MacKenzie Gore pitched seven innings of three-hit ball and Amed Rosario homered to break a scoreless tie in the seventh as the Washington Nationals beat the Chicago Cubs 2-0 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gore outpitches Boyd as Nationals blank Cubs 2-0 to even series

highlights.headline: Manzardo's long ball tacks on a run for Cleveland
